text: Comerica Park is a baseball park in Detroit, Michigan. It is the home field of the Major League Baseball team called the Detroit Tigers. It was opened in 2000. Before that, the Tigers had played in historic Tiger Stadium. == References == *Green Cathedrals, by Philip J. Lowry Category:Major League Baseball venues Category:Detroit Tigers Category:Sports buildings in the United States Category:Buildings and structures in Detroit Category:2000 establishments in the United States Category:2000s establishments in Michigan
title: Comerica Park
